mapper.select: SELECT T1.CL_CODE , T1.CL_CODE_NM , T1.CL_CODE_DC , T1.USE_AT CL_CODE_USE_AT , T2.CODE_ID , T2.CODE_ID_NM , T2.CODE_ID_DC , T2.USE_AT FROM COMMON_CLCODE T1 , COMMON_CODE T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CL_CODE = T2.CL_CODE AND T1.USE_AT = 'Y' AND T2.USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT T1.CODE_ID , T1.CODE_ID_NM , T2.CODE , T2.CODE_NM , T2.CODE_DC , T2.USE_AT FROM COMMON_CODE T1 , COMMON_CODE_DETAIL T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CODE_ID = T2.CODE_ID AND T1.USE_AT = 'Y' AND T2.USE_AT = 'Y'
